content: **pattern # ** lw1511 / lw4490en / lw4490de / c-117 **skill level ** intermediate **supplies ** super saver 15 ounces color a 313 aran and 17 ounces color b 376 burgundy knitting worsted wool 21 oz bittersweet and 25 oz navy yarn needle **gauge ** square = 5¼ persian tiles is an updated version of the vintage pattern persian print there are slight differences between the patterns including the size of each square each motif of the older persian print pattern measures 4 inches square the vintage version of the pattern can be found on free vintage crochet 1 the german version can be found here 2 1 http //freevintagecrochet com/afghan-patterns/coats289/persian-print-afghan 2 https //web archive org/web/20160831035531if_/http //www redheart de/files/patterns/pdf/lw4490de pdf
